weapon.name: Venus
weapon.description: Its designer is unknown. The special hovering EM Blaster's prototype's blueprint has been lost. It contains a unique electrical saving process in its interior. It's extremely troublesome to repair when it gets worn out, but Cobalt-B of Banges Tech seems to be able to do it.

weaponEffects.title: Volt Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase volt ATK by **15%** and volt resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Volt Benediction
weaponEffects.description: Increase the entire team's volt ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is active.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, use Venus to attack **5** times in a row.
The first attack deals damage equal to **50.8%** of ATK plus **305**.
The second attack deals damage equal to **36.3%** of ATK plus **218**.
The third attack deals damage equal to **98.3%** of ATK plus **590**.
The fourth attack deals damage equal to **67.3%** of ATK plus **404**.
The fifth attack deals damage equal to **148.3%** of ATK plus **890**.

normals.name: Aerial Discharge
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **5** times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.5%** of ATK plus **375**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.5%** of ATK plus **375**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **120%** of ATK plus **720**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **71.2%** of ATK plus **427**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **126%** of ATK plus **756**.

normals.name: Quick Pursuit
normals.description:
After the second normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Quick Pursuit.
Shoot a laser-guided missile at the target, dealing damage up to **107.5%** of ATK plus **645**.

normals.name: Dual Focus
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release an electrified ball that explodes on hit, dealing damage equal to **118.4%** of ATK plus **710** to nearby enemies.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Twin Spinning Focus
dodge.description:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window to trigger a slowing magnetic field.
Venus fires a charged orb that explodes after traveling forward a set distance or coming in contact with targets. Deal damage equal to **171.6%** of ATK plus **1030**, and generate a slowing magnetic field for **3** seconds, which reduces the movement speed and attack speed of all enemies caught within by **35%**.
Dodging will trigger a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by **67.7%** of the Wanderer's ATK; for the next **10** seconds, a small Healing Chain will trigger every **2** seconds, which heals nearby allies by **22.5%** of the Wanderer's ATK. Dodging grants **1** stack of Healing Chain enhance, which increases the effects of Healing Chains by **25%**. Stacks up to **5** times and lasts for **30** seconds. Switching weapons doesn't cancel this effect.

dodge.name: Parallel Beams
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Parallel Beams.
Venus fires a pair of parallel energy beams, dealing piercing damage equal to **171.6%** of ATK plus **1030**.
Dodging will trigger a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by **67.7%** of the Wanderer's ATK; for the next **10** seconds, a small Healing Chain will trigger every **2** seconds, which heals nearby allies by **22.5%** of the Wanderer's ATK. Dodging grants **1** stack of Healing Chain enhance, which increases the effects of Healing Chains by **25%** (stack up to **5** times) and lasts for **30** seconds. Switching weapons doesn't cancel this effect.

skill.name: Pulse Lock
skill.description: Venus fires a guided missile that explodes on contact with enemy targets, dealing damage equal to **233.2%** of ATK plus **1399** and knocking down targets. Cooldown: **25** seconds.

discharge.name: Particle Beam Burst
discharge.description:
When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and command Venus to fire a cross-shaped ray at the ground, creating an unstable area and slowing targets' movement speed by **70%** for **5** seconds. After a brief delay, unleash an electromagnetic burst that deals damage equal to **393.9%** of ATK plus **2363**.
Using a discharge attack will spawn **1** Electrode at the target's position that attacks once every **1.5** seconds, dealing damage equal to **44%** of ATK plus **264**.
The Electrode gains **100%** of the Wanderer's stats, can be attacked or healed, and loses **3%** of its Max HP every second.
Only **1** Electrode can exist at any given time, and summoning a new Electrode will replace the previous one.

advancements.description: After using **Pulse Lock** or **Particle Beam Burst**, creates **1** Electrode that immediately grants the user **5** stacks of Healing Chain Enhance. In addition, unleash a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by **135%** of the Wanderer's ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Every **6** seconds, the Electrode will unleash **Ring Lightning**, which deals area damage equal to a maximum of **230%** of ATK.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
After using **Pulse Lock**, increase the Wanderer's ATK by (**5** + (Number of Electrodes ×**5**))% for **25** seconds.
Up to **2** Electrodes can be active at the same time. Summoning more Electrodes will replace the ones furthest from the user.

matrice.name: Nemesis
matrice.description: More than half of the hull has been replaced. I wonder if there is a way to measure the proportion of souls?

set.set_2: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by **8%**/**10%**/**12%**/**15%** for **20** seconds. This effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.set_4: When healing yourself or your Electrode, the target of healing gains a charge of "Lightning." The next attack within **30** seconds will cast Lightning, dealing volt damage equal to **240%**/**300%**/**360%**/**420%** of volt ATK on the first target hit, and damage caused by Electrodes is reduced by **50%**. Cannot be triggered more than once in **10** seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
